fields.headline: The Bonham Hotel, Edinburgh
fields.bodyText: Spend two nights at the award-winning Bonham Hotel in Edinburgh's Georgian new town. Scotland's original hotel of cool is offering a prize of a two-night break, to be taken before March 31 2001 (subject to availability). Each room at The Bonham is individually designed, decorated and furnished. Stay in one of the hotel's luxury suites: favourites include suite 104, know as 'the blue room', which overlooks private gardens, or Room 1, spread over two floors and including a huge copper bath. · For further information please contact relax@thebonham.com, quoting Guardian Unlimited Travel, or phone 0131 623 6060.
